content: त्यागः [त्यज्-भावे घञ्] {@--1@} Leaving, forsaking, abandoning, deserting, separation; न माता न पिता न स्त्री न पुत्रस्त्यागमर्हति <ls>Ms. 8. 389</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">9. 79.</ls> {@--2@} Giving up, resigning, renouncing; <ls>Ms. 10. 112</ls>; <ls>Bg. 12. 11.</ls> {@--3@} Gift, donation, giving away as charity; करे श्लाघ्यस्त्यागः <ls>Bh. 2. 65</ls>; <ls>H. 1. 154</ls>; त्यागाय संभृतार्थानां <ls>R. 1. 17</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 169.</ls> {@--4@} Liberality, generosity; <ls>R. 1. 22.</ls> {@--5@} Secretion, excretion. {@--6@} Dismissing, discharging. {@--7@} Sacrificing oneself. {@--8@} A sage.
